member.summary: Whether to validate when property value changes

member.summary: Name of the validation method to call

member.name: T:Wpf.Abstractions.Content.IContentControl
member.summary: Interface for content navigation control. Used by step/content ViewModels to navigate and request close. Provides navigation methods and close request capability.

member.name: P:Wpf.Abstractions.Content.IContentControl.HistoryDepth
member.summary: Number of items in navigation history

member.name: M:Wpf.Abstractions.Content.IContentControl.RequestClose
member.summary: Request close of the host (raises CloseRequested event on IContentState)

member.name: T:Wpf.Abstractions.Content.IContentHost
member.summary: Interface for host that can be closed. Provides actual close functionality. Implemented by IWindowContext.

member.name: M:Wpf.Abstractions.Content.IContentHost.CloseWithResult``1(``0)
member.summary: Close dialog with typed result data. For future use - allows closing dialog with result from non-ViewModel code.
member.param: Result data to return from dialog

member.name: T:Wpf.Abstractions.Content.IContentState
member.summary: Interface for observing content state. Used by Shell ViewModels to bind and subscribe to navigation events. Contains state properties and events for notifications.

member.name: P:Wpf.Abstractions.Content.IContentState.HistoryDepth
member.summary: Number of items in navigation history

member.name: E:Wpf.Abstractions.Content.IContentState.CloseRequested
member.summary: Raised when content requests close. Host can set Cancel=true to prevent close.

member.name: T:Wpf.Abstractions.Content.CloseRequestEventArgs
member.summary: Event args for close request with confirmation support

member.name: P:Wpf.Abstractions.Content.CloseRequestEventArgs.ShowConfirmation
member.summary: Whether to show confirmation dialog before closing

member.name: M:Wpf.Abstractions.Content.CloseRequestEventArgs.#ctor(System.Boolean,System.String)
member.summary: Creates new close request event args

member.name: T:Wpf.Abstractions.Diagnostics.Severity
member.summary: Severity level for messages, validations, and notifications.

member.name: T:Wpf.Abstractions.Identity.IToken
member.summary: Base marker interface for type-safe tokens. Tokens are immutable identifiers with metadata.

member.name: P:Wpf.Abstractions.Identity.IToken.Color
member.summary: Token status color representing lifecycle state. Green = active, Yellow = transitioning, Red = closed/faulted.

member.name: P:Wpf.Abstractions.Identity.IToken.IsEmpty
member.summary: Check if this is an empty/default token

member.name: T:Wpf.Abstractions.Identity.IToken`1
member.summary: Generic token interface with factory methods and equality support. Enables polymorphic token operations via static abstract members (C# 11+). Uses CRTP (Curiously Recurring Template Pattern) for type-safe factory methods.
member.remarks: Note: IEquatable<TSelf> is not included here because records implement it automatically. IEquatable<Guid> is included for convenient comparison with Guid values.
member.typeparam: The implementing token type (must be a reference type)

member.name: M:Wpf.Abstractions.Identity.IToken`1.FromGuid(System.Guid)
member.summary: Create token from existing Guid (for migration/compatibility). Note: This creates a basic token - type-specific metadata will use defaults.
member.param: The Guid to create token from
member.returns: New token instance with the specified Id

member.name: T:Wpf.Abstractions.Identity.TokenColor
member.summary: Status color representing token lifecycle state. Used for visual indication and state tracking of windows, sessions, and other tokens.

member.name: F:Wpf.Abstractions.Identity.TokenColor.Yellow
member.summary: Yellow - token is in transition (closing, processing)

member.name: F:Wpf.Abstractions.Identity.TokenColor.Red
member.summary: Red - token is closed, completed, or faulted

member.name: T:Wpf.Abstractions.Lifecycle.IActivatable
member.summary: Interface for ViewModels that support activation/deactivation lifecycle Used by IContentManager to manage content state

member.name: M:Wpf.Abstractions.Lifecycle.IActivatable.OnActivateAsync(System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Called when content becomes active (visible/focused) Use this to refresh data, start background tasks, etc.

member.name: M:Wpf.Abstractions.Lifecycle.IActivatable.OnDeactivateAsync(System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Called when content becomes inactive (hidden/unfocused) Use this to pause tasks, save state, etc.

member.name: P:Wpf.Abstractions.Lifecycle.IActivatable.IsActive
member.summary: Indicates whether this content is currently active

member.name: T:Wpf.Abstractions.Lifecycle.IInitializable`1
member.summary: Entity that requires async initialization with parameters

member.name: T:Wpf.Abstractions.Lifecycle.LifecycleState
member.summary: Universal lifecycle state for any managed entity (windows, sessions, scopes, etc.)

member.name: T:Wpf.Abstractions.Results.IResult
member.summary: Base result interface following Result Pattern

member.name: P:Wpf.Abstractions.Results.IResult.Exception
member.summary: Exception if operation failed with exception
